name: Manic Miner
description: You play the role of Miner Willy, a bold explorer and adventurer. He discovers a network of underground caverns used by an advanced but now extinct civilization, and realizes that the mines contain lucrative metal ores. Through 20 caverns, you must collect all treasures before all time (air) runs out, watching out for the nasty guardians, the obstacles, dead falls, quicksands and all elements to be found in a classic platform game.
alsoFor: Amiga, Amstrad CPC, bada, BBC Micro, Commodore 16, Plus/4, Commodore 64, Dragon 32/64, iPad, iPhone, Memotech MTX, MSX, Oric, Tatung Einstein, Windows Phone, ZX Spectrum | Combined View

releases.country: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom

shot.caption: Original Mode sees a faithful reconstruction of the original speccy levels
Once you have all the keys you exit the level by touching the lock
Enhanced Mode has completely new levels and enemies
